title: HOUR 1 - Belichick, Trey Lance, Joe Judge
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Belichick, Trey Lance, Joe Judge
description:
It seems like everyone is piling on Bill Belichick

Don't start a young QB if he isn't ready

Joe Judge's comments on analytics aren't as bad as some think.


Guest: Jonathan Vilma

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
